text: XHSIG-FM is a noncommercial radio station on 88.5 FM in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, Mexico. It is owned by Sinaloa, Arte y Gloria, A.C. and known as La Interesante de Los Mochis. ==History== XHSIG was approved on December 19, 2017, as part of the IFT clearing a backlog of radio station applications in Los Mochis;IFT: Clearing of Los Mochis Permit Forest it signed on air in September 2018, joining XHGVE-FM 94.5, which had been built two years earlier. The concessionaire is owned by Román Padilla Fierro, a former Institutional Revolutionary Party deputy for Sinaloa's first district, including the town of El Fuerte. Padilla Fierro has previous experience in the radio business. He has been a radio announcer, and from 1987 to 1992 he was the secretary general of STIRT, the union representing broadcasting workers in Mexico.[sil.gobernacion.gob.mx/Librerias/pp_PerfilLegislador.php?SID=&Referencia;=9216244 Legislator Profile: Román Alfredo Padilla Fierro] ==References== Category:Spanish-language radio stations Category:Radio stations in Sinaloa Category:2018 establishments in Mexico Category:Radio stations established in 2018
